mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(FREENUM) FROM FREE WHERE Like #{pattern}

SELECT F.*, M.*, C.* FROM FREE F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON F.USERNO = M.USERNO INNER JOIN CATEGORY C ON F.CATEGORYNUM = C.CATEGORYNUM WHERE
LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ORDER BY FREENUM DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{lastRow}

SELECT F.*, (SELECT FREENUM FROM FREE WHERE FREENUM < F.FREENUM ORDER BY FREENUM DESC LIMIT 1) AS last, (SELECT FREETITLE FROM FREE WHERE FREENUM < F.FREENUM ORDER BY FREENUM DESC LIMIT 1) AS lasttitle, (SELECT FREENUM FROM FREE WHERE FREENUM > F.FREENUM ORDER BY FREENUM ASC LIMIT 1) AS next, (SELECT FREETITLE FROM FREE WHERE FREENUM > F.FREENUM ORDER BY FREENUM ASC LIMIT 1) AS nexttitle FROM FREE F WHERE FREENUM = #{freeNum}
SELECT F.*, M.NAME, C.* FROM FREE F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON F.USERNO = M.USERNO INNER JOIN CATEGORY C ON F.CATEGORYNUM = C.CATEGORYNUM WHERE F.FREENUM = #{freeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREE VALUES(null, #{categoryNum}, #{freeTitle}, #{userNo}, #{freeContents}, NOW(), null, 0)
